pages.title: Advanced Materials
pages.text: The advanced systems introduce powerful new materials for crafting the ultimate equipment.$(br2)These materials are obtained through alchemy, meteor summoning, or both.

pages.title: Enhanced Gold
pages.text: Gold infused with stellar energy through alchemy.$(br2)$(li)$(7)Source$(): Alchemy$(li)$(7)Recipe$(): Gold + Stardust$(br2)Used in advanced magical equipment.

pages.title: Radiant Diamond
pages.text: A diamond that has absorbed pure starlight.$(br2)$(li)$(7)Source$(): Alchemy$(li)$(7)Recipe$(): Diamond + 2x Stardust$(br2)Exceptional durability and power.

pages.title: Celestial Nucleus
pages.text: The ultimate alchemical creation.$(br2)$(li)$(7)Source$(): Alchemy$(li)$(7)Recipe$(): Star Fragment + Nether Star + Catalyst$(br2)Contains the essence of the cosmos itself.

pages.title: Prismatic Meteorite
pages.text: A fragment of a rainbow meteor.$(br2)$(li)$(7)Source$(): Meteor Summoning$(li)$(7)Meteor Type$(): Prismatic$(br2)Shimmers with all colors of the celestial spectrum.
